content: Can Lean4 syntax highlighting be done via CDN?
What does CDN mean in this context? Search seems to give only "content delivery network", and I'm not sure how that fits the question.

For example, in mdbook, is it possible to put a script tag so that js is loaded remotely and syntax highlighting is enabled? I'm asking if there is a way other than placing the highlight.js file directly in the repository.
That would be a good option, but if this is ever implemented I hope it is opt-in for privacy reasons.
(I use Decentraleyes, so maybe it doesn't matter much in my particular case)
